question: Which of the following is India's first agromet forecast centre?
option1: North Malabar Agromet Forecasting and Research Centre
option2: North Karnataka Agromet Forecasting and Research Centre
option3: North Coromandel Agromet Forecasting and Research Centre
option4: North Andhra Agromet Forecasting and Research Centre
answer: North Karnataka Agromet Forecasting and Research Centre
explanation: North Karnataka Agromet Forecasting and Research Centre is Indiaâ€™s first agromet forecast centre located at University of Agricultural Sciences (UAS) in Dharwad, Karnataka. The main objective of the centre is to give accurate reports on the weather which would enable the farmers to protect the crops and get a good yield.
